custom-sql.sql: select state_name from cholaconference_state where state_id=?;
select location_id,location_name from cholaconference_location where state_id=?;
select room_values from cholaconference_room where room_id=?;
select location_name from cholaconference_location where location_id=?;
select floor_name from cholaconference_floorwing where floorwing_id=?;
